thread.section_title: US Service Animals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of US Service Animals | usserviceanimals.org
thread.title: Toni Marie Abeyta
thread.title_full: US Service Animals reviewed by Toni Marie Abeyta

author: Toni Marie Abeyta
title: Toni Marie Abeyta
text:
From the first contact with agent Cheryl- i was in best care. My fathers' situation left me wondering if his dog met criteria- and within 15 minutes, my 86 year old father has his service puppy. Now he can travel unrestricted.
Thank you US Service- i give you 5 stars for 5 star handling of myself and my father. Cheryl is the best!
